### Key Findings

The data visualization above reveals important consumer feedback regarding:

- **Scent preferences**: Whether customers preferred scented or unscented formulations
- **Product consistency**: Consumer opinions on the desired liquidity/texture of the hand sanitizer

These insights guided our product development to better align with market demands.
